objects.text:
• 24-hour moisture protection
• For dry to very dry skin
• Dermatologist recommended
• Strengthens skin's moisture barrier

product_details.name: Cetaphil Daily Advance - Your Skin's Ultimate Hydration Solution
product_details.description:
• Ultra-hydrating formula for 24-hour moisture protection
• Specifically designed for dry to very dry skin types
• Dermatologist recommended and clinically tested
• Non-comedogenic formula that won't clog pores
• Fast-absorbing, non-greasy texture
• Contains 5 key moisturizing ingredients
• Gentle enough for daily use
• Fragrance-free and hypoallergenic
• Helps strengthen skin's moisture barrier
• Suitable for sensitive skin

banner_details:
The banner features a skincare product showcased with a dynamic diagonal layout that splits the background into two sections. The top left features a dark teal gradient with modern geometric accents, while the bottom right transitions to a soft white gradient. The main title (`heading`) and secondary title (`subheading`) are bold and positioned top-left in white, conveying a strong brand presence. Below them, the `tagline` in a contrasting pale mint typeface reinforces the product category. A thin horizontal line (`decorative`) separates the titles from the bullet list (`description`) highlighting key features. A high-resolution product image (`product_image`) is prominently placed to the right. Beneath, a large price text (`price`) draws attention, and a brightly colored call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) with a promotional note (`promotional_text`) completes the lower part of the banner.

**Color Palette:**
- Teal Green: #0A6B79
- Mint Green: #089B7F
- Fresh Aqua: #E8F5F3
- Bright Green: #04F489
- White: #FFFFFF
- Deep Teal (text): #0A6B79
product_color: The product image features a clean and professional color palette centered around white, green, and blue tones, perfectly suited for a skincare product. White (#FFFFFF) dominates the background and signifies purity and clinical effectiveness. The deep blue (#0058A6) in the Cetaphil logo conveys trust and reliability, while the bright green (#3DBA36) panel and cap represent freshness, hydration, and health. Lighter green (#A9D18E) is used to complement and soften the boldness of the brighter green. These colors are skillfully blended in sections to maintain contrast, ensuring readability and product emphasis. This palette can form a cohesive, clean, and trustworthy advertisement banner.
